overview: In this erotic sequel to Erika Lust’s award-winning short film Handcuffs (2009), seductive couple Natalia Paris & Paco Roca return to their erotic playground; this time in search of a third party. The short movie was shot within 24 hours at Barcelona’s Camper Hotel as part of their opening in which filmmakers were invited to shoot a 7 minute film. Transforming the boutique space into a sexy Love Hotel, Erika Lust took her opportunity to shoot a hot ménage à trois. Room 33 shows us what happens behind closed doors, the sexy side of travel, and uninhibited intimacy with strangers. Do not disturb!
title: Room 33
